doc:
Anthony Ainley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthony_Ainley 0 Anthony Ainley (20 August 1932 – 3 May 2004) was an English actor best known for his work on British television and particularly for his role as the Master in Doctor Who. He was the fourth actor to play the role of the Master, and the first actor to portray the Master as a recurring role since the death of Roger Delgado in 1973. Anthony_Ainley ( 20_August_1932 – 3_May_2004 ) was an_English_actor best_known for his_work on British_television and particularly for his_role as the_Master in Doctor Who . He was the_fourth_actor to_play the_role of the_Master , and the_first_actor to_portray the_Master as a_recurring_role since the_death of Roger_Delgado in 1973 .
